text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, kafiron ki si baatein na karo jinke azeez o aqarib agar kabhi safar par jatey hain ya jung mein shareek hotey hain ( aur wahan kisi haadse se do-char ho jatey hain ) to woh kehte hain ke agar woh hamare paas hotey to na marey jatey aur na qatal hotey. Allah is qism ki baaton ko unke dilon mein hasrat o andoh ka sabab bana deta hai, warna dar-asal maarne aur jilane wala to Allah hi hai aur tumhari tamaam harakaat par wahi nigraan hai
